item.title: JWT
item.description: Structure JJJJ.PPPPPPP.SSSSSSSS JOSE Payload Signature RFCs JWS JWT Usage Validation Algorithm 7.2. Validating a JWT When validating a JWT, the following steps are performed. The order of the steps is not significant in cases where there are no dependencies between the inputs and outputs of the steps. If any of the listed steps fail, then the JWT MUST be rejected – that is, treated by the application as an invalid input.
